title: Teddy bears at play [1939]
creator_credit: Australian National Travel Association, Mel F. Nichols and Winifred Lade
brief_description: An intimate study of the koala. This quaint and friendly creature with its soft round furry body is the most popular of Australia’s unique animals. Photographed by Mel. F. Nichols, edited by Winifred Lade.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Travel Association, Mel F. Nichols and Winifred Lade
